explanation: [0-0] A little girl in a red dress is sitting at the top of a blue slide in a park, while a man in a red shirt and black pants stands next to the slide. The little girl is holding colorful lollipops, and the man's left hand is placed on her back. In the background, some green plants and trees can be seen, as well as some buildings in the distance.
[0-2] Then the little girl scatters the lollipops in her hand on the slide, and the lollipops slide down the slope of the slide.
[0-2] Then the little girl scatters the lollipops in her hand on the slide, and the lollipops slide down the slope of the slide.

[2-5] Immediately afterwards, the little girl slides down the slide, and the camera moves down with her movement. Then the little girl slides to the bottom of the slide and finds a puddle of water at the bottom. Some lollipops have fallen into the water, and a few lollipops are still on the slide. The little girl looks down at the lollipops that have fallen into the water.
